sentence: what rivers flow through states that alabama borders ?
sentence-with-vars: what rivers flow through states that state0 borders ?
sql: select river.river_name from river where river.traverse in ( select border_info.border from border_info where border_info.state_name = ' alabama ' ) ;
sql-with-vars: select river.river_name from river where river.traverse in ( select border_info.border from border_info where border_info.state_name = ' state0 ' ) ;
